original_title: Two or Three Things I Know about Edward Hopper
overview: TWO OR THREE THINGS I KNOW ABOUT EDWARD HOPPER is an immersive experience in 3D, that takes its viewers on a journey into the world of Hopper, sharpening their senses for some aspects of his unique work.
tagline: A 3D Film Installation by Wim Wenders at Fondation Beyeler
title: Two or Three Things I Know about Edward Hopper
